text: Rhamnus is a genus of plants in the Rhamnaceae family. They are commonly known as buckthorns. There are around 110 species, and their height can be anywhere from 1 to 15 meters. Rhamnus species are called buckthorns because they have spines on their twigs. One common species is Rhamnus cathartica, the common buckthorn. == References == Category:Rhamnaceae
title: Rhamnus
